::Soundwave gets blown back from the blast and falls on his back.  He sees a 
bright light ahead of him and knows he's passing to the matrix.  He comes 
face to face with the oracle::
Oracle:  You may not enter here
Soundwave:  But why? I am tired, I want to rest.
Oracle: You play a part in what is to come.  I will give you a new body.
::Soundwave gets completely rearanged.  He is now Stalker::
Stalker: I am ready to continue my battle
Oracle: Very well
::He gets beamed back to the battle and transforms to tank mode.  He tries to 
run Nemises Enforcer down while shooting missles at Scattershot::
